page.title: 11Women's and Youth Groups
page.content: { {OffleyHay- Womens Club Recently formed to cater for women in the area seeking an alternative to W.I. Fifteen members meet monthly in the Offley Hay village hall. They are encouraged to take turns organising meetings and be responsible for arranging a Speaker or activity. There is a wide range of interests and skills in the local community, among women of different ages. It is hoped to encourage wives who tend to lose confidence after giving up work, also to make use of the village hall. {Youth Club} There are also plans to have a Youth Club in the village hall to cater for the young people in the area.
